home.title: Resources
testtabs.title: Create or Edit tests
questionbanks.instructions.edit: To Create a new test, select questions in Question Banks or Custom Questions, then click on the pencil icon or drag or drop the questions here.
questionbanks.instructions.create: To edit one of your tests, open Your Tests and drag test here.
questionbanks.instructions.automatic: To create a test automatically from selected topics, select the Test Wizard button.
discipline.steps.3: Pick the discipline(s) on the right in which you create.
discipline.steps.4: This will make the questions banks in these descipline available to you
discipline.steps.5: Can select more than one discipline by clicking.Tap again to deselect
